translation.home-left-text: Do you have any ideas? Let's bring them to life together!
translation.about-left-text: Hi, my name is Leonardo, I'm a software developer with a strong foundation in full stack, where I honed my skills through an intensive bootcamp at Boolean. Since then, I've been contributing to the development of mobile apps, web applications and AI/ML projects, including work with CNN models. My main tech stack includes JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express.js and PostgreSQL.
translation.name: NAME
translation.omniloq-description: Encrypts every password, safely storing your accounts and logins. Create and save as many items you want. Available for desktop and mobile.
translation.wizard-description: Created for Wizard branches to manage and monitor their employees' work. Employees can register customers, and the company can easily access all data related to it.
translation.allegrow-description: Built a SaaS platform that connects children's event providers with parents.
